testcase.name: Make order " Buy Iphone" and Deliver it to user address
testcase.system-out: Given Choose English Language...............................................passed And Go to Shop By Brand section and select IphoneLogo.......................passed And Select any of returned iphone mobiles...................................passed When Press add to cart......................................................passed And Press Proceed to Checkout...............................................passed And Select Delivery Options as "Cairo" and "Ain Shams"......................passed And Select Deliver to My Address............................................passed And Add address details then press continue.................................passed And Leave Personal info Tab empty and Press continue........................passed Then Assert on error message returned from Full Name field..................passed
